pkgmetadata.longdescription: createrepo_c is a C implementation of the classical createrepo tool and simultaneously a C library for manipulation with a repodata. createrepo_c provides Python bindings too, so could be easily used instead of yum library for certain kinds of manipulations with repodata.

use.flag: Build with zchunk support through app-arch/zchunk
Support RPM modules metadata through sys-libs/libmodulemd
